import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('placeOrderHandler'); } //calculate price cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) return

  • Shipping

    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment Method

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Orders

    {cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? 'Your cart is empty' : (
      {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => { return

    • {item.name}

      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • })}
    )}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${cart.itemsPrice}
  • Shipping
    ${cart.shippingPrice}
  • Tax
    ${cart.taxPrice}
  • Total
    ${cart.totalPrice}
; }
